Heading: FEATURED PROJECTS
title: MAJESTIQUE RESIDENCE
paragraph3: Le Solarium is a commercial building with a perfect blend of modern facilities in Dubai Silicon Oasis. This building consists of 15 floors in total. This commercial tower offers multiple choices when it comes to food and retail outlets, along with other amenities like a gymnasium & swimming pool.
paragraph: Lies in the prestigious Madinat Al Mataar, Dubai South Community. Spacious, fully furnished 1BR, 2BR and Studio Apartments complement your distinguished lifestyle.
paragraph1: Mon Rêve, a boutique residential building in Downtown Dubai, in close proximity of The Dubai Mall and the iconic Burj Khalifa. The building has superior quality finishes, high ceilings, floor-to-ceiling windows, a choice of 1, 2, 3 Bedrooms and Duplex Mall View apartments.
paragraph2: Mon Rêve, a boutique residential building in Downtown Dubai, in close proximity of The Dubai Mall and the iconic Burj Khalifa. The building has superior quality finishes, high ceilings, floor-to-ceiling windows, a choice of 1, 2, 3 Bedrooms and Duplex Mall View apartments.
paragraph4: The Prism is a 35-floor commercial tower located on Happiness Street in Business Bay. It is an architectural marvel with amenities such as health club, swimming pool, restaurants and retail outlets. The Prism is in close proximity to Dubai International Finance Centre (DIFC), The Burj Khalifa & Dubai Mall.
